name: MetalGarurumon ACE
specialDigivolve: [Digivolve] From Lv.5 w/[Garurumon] in its name: Cost 3
effect:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost).
[When Digivolving] By trashing up to 3 cards in your hand, gain 1 Memory for each card trashed.
aceEffect: Overflow ＜-4＞ (When this card is sent from battle area or under your card to another area, lose 4 memory).
